sn12.17:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn12.17:1.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn12.17:1.4: Addasā kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn12.17:1.5: Disvāna yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn12.17:1.6: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:1.7: “puccheyyāma mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ kañcideva desaṃ, sace no bhavaṃ gotamo okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn12.17:2.1: Dutiyampi kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:2.2: “puccheyyāma mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ kañcideva desaṃ, sace no bhavaṃ gotamo okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn12.17:2.7: Evaṃ vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:2.8: “na kho pana mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ bahudeva pucchitukāmā”ti.
sn12.17:3.5: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:3.7: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:3.9: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:3.12: ‘Tena hi bhavaṃ gotamo dukkhaṃ na jānāti, na passatī’ti.
sn12.17:3.13: ‘Na khvāhaṃ, kassapa, dukkhaṃ na jānāmi, na passāmi.
sn12.17:4.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.2: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, paraṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.3: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.4: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.5: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho, kassapa, natthi dukkhaṃ, atthi kho, kassapa, dukkhan’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.6: ‘Tena hi bhavaṃ gotamo dukkhaṃ na jānāti na passatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na khvāhaṃ, kassapa, dukkhaṃ na jānāmi na passāmi.
sn12.17:4.9: Ācikkhatu ca me, bhante, bhagavā dukkhaṃ.
sn12.17:4.10: Desetu ca me, bhante, bhagavā dukkhan”ti.
sn12.17:5.1: “‘So karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, kassapa, ādito sato ‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti vadaṃ sassataṃ etaṃ pareti.
sn12.17:5.2: ‘Añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, kassapa, vedanābhitunnassa sato ‘paraṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti vadaṃ ucchedaṃ etaṃ pareti.
sn12.17:5.3: Ete te, kassapa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti:
sn12.17:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:6.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya …pe… ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn12.17:6.4: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn12.17:6.5: Labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
sn12.17:7.1: “Yo kho, kassapa, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, so cattāro māse parivasati. Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
sn12.17:8.1: “Sace, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, cattāro māse parivasati. Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya. Ahaṃ cattāri vassāni parivasissāmi, catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu upasampādentu bhikkhubhāvāyā”ti.
sn12.17:9.1: Alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
sn12.17:9.2: Acirūpasampanno ca panāyasmā kassapo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn12.17:9.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn12.17:9.4: Aññataro ca panāyasmā kassapo arahataṃ ahosīti.
